# nats_jwt (Resource)

NATS JWT



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `iss` (String) Issuer
- `name` (String) Name
- `sub` (String) Subject

### Optional

- `aud` (String) Audience
- `exp` (Number) Expires
- `iat` (Number) IssuedAt
- `nats` (String) Nats
- `nbf` (Number) NotBefore

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) ID
- `token` (String) Token
